Crain Ancestors

  1. “John” Crane unknown
  2. Benjamin Crane b. abt. 1630, m. 1655, d. 1691
  3. Jonathan Crane b. 1658, m. 1678, d. 1735
  4. John Crane b. 1687, m. 1708 & 1716 d. unknown
  5. Lemuel Crane b. 1725, m. 1752, d. unknown
  6. Zebulon Crane b. 1753, m. 1777, d. 1828
  7. Ebenezer Crain b. 1781, m. 1807, d. 1863
  8. Ebenezer Crain Jr.b. 1819, m. 1841, d. 1905
  9. Arthur Lewis Crain b. 1860, m. 1881, d. 1896
  10. Hillis Crain b. 1889, d. 1957
  11. Eldon Lewis Crain b. 1918, d. 1992
  12. Samuel Crain b. 1952, m. 1976
  13. Joshua Crain b. 1981, m. 2012
